title: The Sheep and the Wolf’s Cradle - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manhwa   Alternate World   Confinement   Dark   Dystopia   Kidnappings   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Pragmatic Protagonist   Secret Organizations   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger   Survival   Weak to Strong
author: Dark Writing   어두운글
description:
“Man is never a peaceful species. If there is a subspecies that is superior, the modern species will feel threatened.”

From some point onward, a new subspecies, the so-called ‘wolves’, appeared to threaten modern humanity.

Modern humans began to confine them to underground cities to protect themselves.

Then one day, the ‘Professor’ was kidnapped and sent to an underground city. 

He realizes that he is a wolf…>
